```{r}
summary_table <- pie_crab %>% 
  group_by(site) %>% 
  summarize(mean_size <- (round(mean(size), 2, na.rm = TRUE)),
            sd_size <- (round(sd(size),2,na.rm = TRUE)),
            sample_size <- n()
  )
```
